CreditMemo.name: CreditMemo
CreditMemo.description: Represents a document that’s used to reduce the amount that a buyer owes a seller under the terms of an earlier invoice.

Balance.description: The amount of the credit memo that's available for allocation.

BillToContactId.description: This field is inherited from the account’s Bill to Account field.

BillingAccountId.description: Required. The ID of the customer account associated with this credit memo.

Category.description: Specifies whether the credit memo is created due to writing off an invoice, converting negative invoice lines, or referencing an existing record.

CorpCrcyCnvTotAmtWithTax.description: The sum of the total amount with tax on the credit memo in corporate currency. Available in API version 63.0 and later.

CorporateCurrencyCvsnDate.description: The date on which the credit memo amounts are converted to the corporate currency. Available in API version 63.0 and later.

CorporateCurrencyCvsnRate.description: The exchange rate that's used to convert credit memo amounts to the corporate currency. Available in API version 63.0 and later.

CorporateCurrencyIsoCode.description: The currency ISO code of the corporate currency. Available in API version 63.0 and later.

CreationMode.description: Specifies whether the credit memo originated in Salesforce or an external system.

CreditDate.description: The date when the credit memo was posted.

CreditMemoNumber.description: The number of the credit memo.

Description.description: Additional details about the credit memo.

DocumentNumber.description: Required. The auto-generated reference number for the credit memo.

EffectiveDate.description: The effective date of the credit memo. If this field is empty, the credit date is used. For reporting purposes only; this field drives no other logic.

ExternalReference.description: An external system’s ID for the credit memo.

ExternalReferenceDataSource.description: The name of the external system that also contains the credit memo.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed a credit memo record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed a credit memo record. If this value is null, it’s possible that the user only accessed the credit memo record or a related list view (LastReferencedDate), but not viewed the credit memo record itself.

LegalEntityAccountingPeriodId.description: The legal entity accounting period record that’s related to the credit memo. This field is available in API version 65.0 and later.

LegalEntityId.description: The legal entity related to the credit memo. This field is available in API version 65.0 and later.

NetCreditsApplied.description: The total difference between the credit applied to and credit unapplied from the invoice.

OwnerId.description: Required. The ID of the user who owns a credit memo record.

ReasonCode.description: The reason code for the credit memo's category. For example, BD can be the reason code when the credit memo's category is InvoiceWriteOff and the reason for the invoice write-off is bad debt. This field is available in API version 64.0 and later.

ReferenceEntityId.description: The ID of the record that this credit memo was generated from. For example, the order, order summary, or invoice.

SettlementLevel.description: Specifies whether the credit memo amount was applied to an invoice or an invoice line.

SourceAction.description: Specifies which Salesforce API created the credit memo.

Status.description: Required. The status of the credit memo.

TotalAdjustmentAmount.description: The sum of the TotalAmount field values for the credit memo’s adjustment lines.

TotalAdjustmentAmountWithTax.description: The sum of the credit memo’s adjustment line amounts, including tax. Available in API versions 62.0 and 63.0.

TotalAdjustmentTaxAmount.description: The sum of the credit memo’s adjustment line tax. Adjustment line balances are excluded. Available in API versions 62.0 and 63.0.

TotalAmount.description: The sum of the credit memo’s TotalLineAmount and TotalAdjustmentAmount field values.

TotalAmountWithTax.description: The total credit memo amount, with tax included.

TotalChargeAmount.description: The sum of the TotalAmount field values for the credit memo’s charge lines.

TotalChargeAmountWithTax.description: The sum of the credit memo’s charge line amounts, including tax. Available in API versions 62.0 and 63.0.

TotalChargeTaxAmount.description: The sum of the credit memo’s charge tax amount. Available in API versions 62.0 and 63.0.

TotalTaxAmount.description: The sum of the TotalAmount field values for the credit memo’s tax lines.
